column5: Hey all,  Hope everyone is enjoying the Spring that never wants to end !  What are my chances of installing a bowmount on this boat with out any huge alterations to the bow?  The upward angle kind of tells me it wont be easy, but I have no experience with bowmounts to know any better.  Hard to tell by the picture but there is a triangular bow plate there big enough to mount the Motorguide Wireless trolling motor that I have in mind.    Look forward to your input, Thanks in advance.  MB
Use longer bolts and level with wood or steel pieces under the  back of the bracket Richard
So regardless I'd have to find a way to level that out I take it?
you definetely want it to sit level, or as close to level as possible
just shim it up with a piece of wood to make the motor level and your good to go
